author: Robert Summers, Indianapolis Mortgage Examiner
title: Indianapolis Homeowners & Residents without Power
text:
Indianapolis Homeowners & Residents without Power Use your key for the next article There's no lights in my neighborhood. Google search for dark 
On Monday July 13th, 2015 75,000 Indianapolis Power & Light customers were affected by storms. Utility Crews have been working hard to get power back on, putting in 16 hour shifts. 
Neighbors have been calling the Mayors Action Center (317) 327-4622 reporting downed power lines or just trying to get power back on at their homes. Residents and homeowners can take action in finding out when a crew may be in the area by calling the IPL Power Outage line (317) 261-8111 the automated system is slow but pressing option #4 will get you a live customer service team member, who is very polite and reassuring the automated system will call you back when your lights are back on. Tweet them using #INwx 
I`m waiting now.
